summary:
The Akaviri Dai-Katana is back!
Now Craftable and upgradeable!
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/YMz86Ai.png[/img][/url][/center]==================
Akaviri Dai-Katana
==================

I missed the Akaviri Dai-Katana from Oblivion so I just had to "fix" that.
You can now craft your own katana! The main file will be the craftable and upgradeable version.

=========
Optional:
=========
This version adds (3) Two-handed versions of the "Blades Sword" to a new chest in the armory in Sky Haven Temple.
I've also added (3) Blades armors in that chest. Because it is supposed to be an armory ;)

=====
Info:
=====
The comparison screenshot are from a level 1 Nord.

The katana is a little faster than other two handed weapons.
Two-handed Dai-Katana: 0.8000
"Normal two-handed sword": 0.7000
(Optional: Oblivion speed stats: 1.0000)

Forging recipe: 1 Iron Ingot, 1 Leather Strips, 4 Steel Ingots.
Required perk: Steel Smithing.

Same damage as the Elven Greatsword. (Because in the vanilla game the one-handed "Blades sword" have the same damage as the Elven Longsword.)
The value is 600 (one-handed 300.)

========
Install:
========
Extract all the files into your Skyrim/Data folder. And remember to enable the mod! :)
You can also install using the NMM.

==========
Changelog:
==========
1.2.1: Added another version without the chest. This will be the main version.

1.2: Made Akaviri Dai-Katana and Akaviri Katana craftable.

1.1: Made the Dai-Katana upgradeable. Changed the name of the one-handed version to "Akaviri Katana". (Optional: Same speed stats as the Oblivion Dai-Katana)

1.0: Released the Akaviri Dai-Katana.

=================
Permission notes:
=================
You are not allowed to upload this file to other sites under any circumstances.

============
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?]Forever Free[/url]:
============
Is a modder resource made by mysticentity, by adding it to my description means that this mod will always be free. :)
author: aBaDmAn91
